title: Large 3BR and Office APT|  4 min walk to red line! Available 9/1
app_fee: 40$ for credit check, refunded upon accepted application
posting_body: Unit is a 3 Bedroom, 1 bath, w/ open living and dining with an additional office.
Kitchen has all stainless steel appliances and granite countertops, lots of cabinets.
Unit lovingly restored and previously owner occupied.
Lots of space and tons of windows.
Beautiful shared backyard and private back deck, too!
Don’t miss out on seeing this gorgeous apartment!
Apartment is 1800 sq ft. across 2 floors.
4 mins from Redline (Shawmut), 10 min walk to Ashmont.
No AC, but ceiling fans in most rooms.
We are Dog/Cat friendly, however some breeds are not allowed by the insurance company, (sorry, I know it’s stupid) please check with us if you have a dog.
